name: subcultural
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to subculture (= the way of life, customs, and ideas of a group of people within a society that are different from the rest of society): They thought it was cool to write in the slang of a subcultural group. The festival has become something of a sub-cultural institution.
More examplesFewer examplesThis particular subcultural reaction was strong in the 1960s.They're just regular people dressed in "normcore" clothes, unmarked by subcultural style.It's all about belonging to a particular group and is key to subcultural identity.
